#include<stdio.h>
#define ll long long int
#define M 1000000007
ll calcpow(ll a,ll b)
{
	ll ans=1;                            
  while(b !=0 ) {
           if(b%2 == 1) {              
             ans = ans*a ; 
              ans = ans%M;      
           }
   	a = a*a;                  
   	a %= M;                   
   	b /= 2;                  
	}
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	ll n,ans;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		ans = ((calcpow(10,n)/9)*10)-n;
		ans = (ans*7)/9;
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
